Package com.hdcookbook.grinxlet

This directory contains the GrinXlet API for Java SE/Grinview.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
GrinXlet This is a facade to the main controller in GrinView.
 

Package com.hdcookbook.grinxlet Description

This directory contains the GrinXlet API for Java SE/Grinview. A project that uses GrinXlet can refer to the public API in this package, in places like its director. This package is the Java SE version of GrinView. Any public APIs here can be safely used from the director's code, and will work both within Grinview, and within a real xlet.
